full_title: If I Only Had a Brain (intro) by Nnenna Freelon
title: If I Only Had a Brain (intro)
title_with_featured: If I Only Had a Brain (intro)
lyrics:
1 ContributorIf I Only Had a Brain (intro) LyricsI could wile away the hours
Conferrin' with the flowers
Consultin' with the rain
And my head I'd be scratchin'
While my thoughts were busy hatchin'
If I only had a brain

I'd unravel any riddle
For any individ'le
In trouble or in pain

With the thoughts you'd be thinkin'
You could be another Lincoln
If you only had a brain

Oh, I would tell you why
The ocean's near the shore
I could think of things I never thunk before
And then I'd sit and think some more

I would not be just a nuffin'
My head all full of stuffin'
My heart all full of pain
I would dance and be merry
Life would be a ding-a-derry
If I only had a brainYou might also likeEmbed
